performances.venue: Carolina Coliseum - University of South Carolina Columbia, SC

performances.description: First time played often has some magic in it; this is no exception, especially something this cheeky; long, too, like they don't know how to close it
A tremendous show and capped right with a nice Werewolves.  Like Gary Duncan sitting in on it too.
oh, man, they are having fun howling and growling on this one!

performances.venue: St. Paul Civic Center Arena St. Paul, MN
performances.description: Ilove every version of Werewolves they ever did.  This one is fantastic a few short days before the quintessential red rocks version.
Jerry vocals are scratchy but still a very fun energetic performance. London England
